usa: The Fundamental Orders of Connecticut were adopted.<sup id="cite_ref-FOOTNOTEHakim_(vol._2)200383_22-1" class="reference">[22]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-24" class="reference">[24]</sup>
The Fundamental Agreement of the New Haven Colony was signed.<sup id="cite_ref-25" class="reference">[25]</sup>
armenia: Treaty of Zuhab signed between the Ottomans and Safavids. Western Armenia falls decisively under Ottoman rule. Safavids remain in possession of Eastern Armenia.
